unnormalised: Heard Dr. Sharma on NDTV say dengue cases are rising in Delhi NCR. Gotta be careful, especially with the kids going back to school on 1/07/2024.
normalised: Heard Doctor Sharma on N-D-T-V say dengue cases are rising in Delhi N-C-R. Gotta be careful, especially with the kids going back to school on first July two thousand and twenty four.
